taskbody.context: This procedure creates a new resource pool for the master nodes, and one or more resource pools for other hosts.

step.cmd: Log in to the primary node of the high-availability cluster .
step.info: To ensure you are logging in to the primary node, use the virtual hostname (HA-Virtual-Name) or virtual IP address (HA-Virtual-IP) of the high-availability cluster.

step.cmd: Create a new resource pool named master.
Create additional resource pools, if desired.
step.info: At least one additional resource pools is recommended. Many users find it useful to have pool names such as infrastructure and collector-n for groups of delegate hosts.

stepxmp.p: Replace Pool-Name with the name of the pool to create:
Repeat the preceding command as desired.
